page.title: 17Religion near Creed
page.content: ST Creed parish church is one of the six churches under the control of the team rector.The churches are Grampound ,Grampound Road, Laddock, St Erme and Probus.St Creed church is sited at a small road juction(935472) but may be easily missed. The church dates from Norman times but it is mostly 14th and 15th century origin. There are two aisles with a 13th century font at the West end.The church is in a fairly isolated area,and is about three km from Tregony. Tregony parish itself has no church because St James's church,Tregony's previous church was washed down by a very heavy storm in the middle ages. Consequently,Tregony has become very involved with St Cuby's parish church even it is not a part of Tregony.
